CustomField.description: What were the reasons given by the prior school for the recommendation? Please select as many as apply
CustomField.label: Why Is Your Child Attd Referred For

value.fullName: Student is advanced academically based on student’s current grade level and age
value.label: Student is advanced academically based on student’s current grade level and age

value.fullName: Student is behind academically based on student’s current grade level and age
value.label: Student is behind academically based on student’s current grade level and age

value.fullName: Student is experiencing physical or medical difficulty/limitations
value.label: Student is experiencing physical or medical difficulty/limitations

value.fullName: Student is looking to take courses that are not offered at the local school (GT, Honors, AP, etc.)
value.label: Student is looking to take courses that are not offered at the local school (GT, Honors, AP, etc.)

value.fullName: Student participates in extracurricular activities that require a flexible school schedule
value.label: Student participates in extracurricular activities that require a flexible school schedule

value.fullName: Student works at faster pace than his/her fellow students
value.label: Student works at faster pace than his/her fellow students

value.fullName: Student works at slower pace than his/her fellow students
value.label: Student works at slower pace than his/her fellow students

value.fullName: Student would benefit from having more control in setting his/her daily schedule
value.label: Student would benefit from having more control in setting his/her daily schedule
